extendedInfo.description: Hellotxt is a fun and simple dashboard for the real-time web on Android.Love social media but not the information overload? Then download Hellotxt to organise your busy social media world! With Hellotxt you can read all your friends' news in a single place, and also post your own updates to multiple social networks simultaneously.* New Features on the new HelloTxt build 4.0.0:- New intuitive design- Faster & more responsive- More social networks available- Full tablet support* Here are some of the reasons why Hellotxt is great:1. All your social networks appear in one easy-to-use feed. You can even add your favourite RSS feeds.2. Your social networks update together, and you can control how often updates occur.3. Updates can be tagged with locations, you can also show whatâs near you on the map.4. Make your posts fun! Doodle your friendâs pics, draw freestyle on your maps and on your personal photos.5. Love multimedia updates? On Hellotxt there are inline also for tweets of your friends!* Here are some industry reviews of the app:â(Hellotxt) is just one of many mobile and Web applications one can use for updating various social networks from a single interface. It is, nevertheless, a smooth and mighty fine one.âTechCrunch - December 2010âIf youâre a social networking junkie Hellotxt is a service that can give you back some of your real world social timeâBBC Click - January 2011

reviews.comment: Does not even open. Uninstalling. Sounds like it would if been cool too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What the hell\'s the matter with this app. It used to work and is a great app and now it won\'t open. It\'s been this way for some months !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Every time I try to post something, I get some \'backend send error\' message.  Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love The Update!
reviews.comment: Htxt has always been great functionally, but has kinda looked wonky. The new update looks awesome and works even better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UnInstalled
reviews.comment: Laggy, clunky. 404 errors when trying to view pics posted. Own posts don\'t show in streams. Epic 4g, 2.2.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I can\'t send any updates -always shows - backend-send-failed. It doesn\'t even show anything in timeline. Same situation with HelloTxt website as well. Send developers email... no response till date.. Hope they fix it soon or at least answer the emails & explain the situation. In the meanwhile I\'m off to look for alternatives.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t add accounts
reviews.comment: I could only get Twitter to work. Adding other accounts threw various errors, couldn\'t add Facebook, Foursquare etc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I like the integration of all the Social Networks... but need more polish and features like location check ins etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fracking sucks
reviews.comment: Always getting network errors from their servers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show my greader feeds. Goes straight to feed view (no home screen as per videos). Posts to *all* sm acc. & just links to hellotxt website?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: New version can only be used sideways :( Does not rotate - please fix this for my Samsung GT-B7510 AND bring back character count...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t sign up. Kept ferrying Network Error.
reviews.author: Andrew Parker

reviews.comment: Back end failure, missing parameters....I was so excited thought this is going to be great! Wasted my time and bytes downloading the junk!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So far, so good. But I wish I could see my friends\' posts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crummy client
reviews.comment: This thing doesn\'t work on Galaxy Nexus. Java IO errors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: it would be great if it have Google+ too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Potential to be great, but repeats network errors.
reviews.comment: Lover this app, but still network errors and NO WIDGET, which is huge for social media.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No more service
reviews.comment: Hello people, the app no longer works because HelloTXT no longer exists as a service.  It was shut down some months ago...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Always crashes! I can\'t use it at all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really? I haven\'t even been able to use this. It won\'t open. CRASH. ERROR REPORTS ???
reviews.author: A Google User
